trans-unit.source: Blind Obedience
trans-unit.target: 盲目服从

trans-unit.resname: WOT·1 | Blind Obedience | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 敲诈（每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{WB}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: WOT·1 | Blind Obedience | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的神器与生物须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Oaths are naught but empty air. Take what measures you must to ensure absolute loyalty."\n—*The Witch's Way*
trans-unit.target: 「庄严誓言亦口说无凭，须采一切可能手段确保绝对忠诚。」 ～《巫婆之道》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·2 | Dawn of Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dawn of Hope
trans-unit.target: 希望曙光

trans-unit.resname: WOT·2 | Dawn of Hope | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·2 | Dawn of Hope | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}：派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·2 | Dawn of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "She was the rising sun, her courage banishing the terrors of the night."\n—*Legend of the Gilded Knights*
trans-unit.target: 「她乃初升之朝阳，其勇气如万丈光芒刺破长空，将黯夜恐惧全数驱散。」 ～《金辉骑士传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·3 | Grasp of Fate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grasp of Fate
trans-unit.target: 命运之攫

trans-unit.resname: WOT·3 | Grasp of Fate | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Grasp of Fate enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until Grasp of Fate leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当命运之攫进战场时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐至多一个目标由该牌手操控的非地永久物，直到命运之攫离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·3 | Grasp of Fate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The witch wrapped her heart in briar vines, hid it away in the ancient keep in the depths of the forest. If none could find it, the prophecy could never come to pass."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
trans-unit.target: 「巫婆用荆条将她心脏包起，藏进树林深处的古堡当中。如果无人能够找到她心在何处，预言也就不可能成真。」 ～《圆石阵奇谭》

trans-unit.source: Greater Auramancy
trans-unit.target: 高等灵气术

trans-unit.resname: WOT·4 | Greater Auramancy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他结界具有帷幕异能。（具帷幕异能的永久物不能成为咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: WOT·4 | Greater Auramancy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且受有灵气的生物具有帷幕异能。

trans-unit.source: "The hunter drew her dagger and found she grasped a flower. She reached for an arrow, but her quiver held only leaves."\n—*Tales of the Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「猎人拔刀相迎，却见手中空握鲜花；她转身抽箭，惊觉袋内只余绿叶。」 ～《仙儿传说》

trans-unit.source: Griffin Aerie
trans-unit.target: 狮鹫栖巢

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过3点或更多生命，则派出一个2/2白色，具飞行异能的狮鹫衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Davin's heart swelled with a heady mix of excitement and fear. If the young griffin accepted him, he would begin his path to knighthood."\n—*Skies of Ardenvale*
trans-unit.target: 「戴文心潮澎湃，惊喜交加：如果这年轻狮鹫接纳了他，他便能就此踏上骑士之路。」 ～《雅登瓦青云志》

trans-unit.source: Intangible Virtue
trans-unit.target: 无形美善

trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生生物得+1/+1且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: "Find glory not in blood, nor dragons felled.\nBut in kindness given, oaths upheld."\n—"The Scholar & the Knight"
trans-unit.target: 「勿以杀伐屠龙争虚名， 试凭守誓行善见品行。」 ～「学者与骑士」

trans-unit.source: Karmic Justice
trans-unit.target: 业报

trans-unit.source: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当由对手操控的咒语或异能消灭一个由你操控的非生物永久物时，你可以消灭目标由该对手操控的永久物。

trans-unit.source: "I have wronged your family on a fool's errand. All I can offer is myself, that you might take your revenge."\n—*The Folly of Syr Perrin*
trans-unit.target: 「我曾因愚人之命而令贵府蒙冤，如今登门谢罪，任君处置。」 ～《佩林爵士愚行录》

trans-unit.source: Knightly Valor
trans-unit.target: 骑士骁勇

trans-unit.resname: WOT·8 | Knightly Valor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: WOT·8 | Knightly Valor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 当骑士骁勇进战场时，派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·8 | Knightly Valor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: Land Tax
trans-unit.target: 抽地税

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若某对手操控的地比你多，则你可以从你牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "'That town is rudely blocking my view!' said the witch. The giant bowed and smiled."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「『那小镇把我视野挡得干干净净！』巫婆愤怒道。巨人微笑欠身，得令退下。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Sanctity
trans-unit.target: 圣洁地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了圣洁地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You have hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 你具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "An enchanted glade revealed itself, offering safety in its warm embrace. Still she walked on."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她眼前出现一片魔法林地，温暖宜人，似可长留此处安全无忧。但她未加理会，径直前行。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Unlife
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚体质

trans-unit.resname: WOT·11 | Phyrexian Unlife | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
trans-unit.target: 你不因总生命为0或更少而输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·11 | Phyrexian Unlife | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命为0或更少，则所有对你造成的伤害均视为其来源具有侵染地造成。（伤害会以中毒指示物的方式对你造成。）

trans-unit.source: "While the realm's great minds quarreled over the strange eclipse, Locthwain fell to the invaders."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「就在世境权威还在为天蚀异象争论不休时，洛司温早已屈从侵攻者。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rest in Peace
trans-unit.target: 得享安息

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 当得享安息进战场时，放逐所有坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某牌或衍生物将从任何区域进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The king ordered those lost in sleep be placed in glass gaskets, protected and watched in case they might one day wake."\n—*The Wicked Slumber*
trans-unit.target: 「国王下令，将迷失沉睡者置于玻璃棺中照护看管，静待他们有朝苏醒。」 ～《恶邪倦眠咒》

trans-unit.source: Smothering Tithe
trans-unit.target: 税赋压身

trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，该牌手可以支付{2}。若该牌手未如此作，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.source: "They laughed with glee as the pixie spun gold from straw. They smiled and shrugged when their curtains and clothes were next on the wheel. Then he grabbed their hair."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「看着碧仙从稻草中纺出黄金，他们笑逐颜开。看着碧仙接着将他们窗帘服饰放上纺车，他们笑容渐止。然后碧仙开始扯起了他们的头发。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.source: As Foretold
trans-unit.target: 预示成真

trans-unit.resname: WOT·14 | As Foretold | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在预示成真上放置一个计时指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·14 | As Foretold | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.
trans-unit.target: 限每回合一次，你施放法术力值等于或小于X的咒语时，可以支付{0}，而不支付其法术力费用，X为预示成真上的计时指示物数量。

trans-unit.source: Compulsion
trans-unit.target: 强迫症

trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，弃一张牌：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Compulsion: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，牺牲强迫症：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "O my love, would that you could understand!\nAdventure beckons; I must take its hand."\n—"The Scholar & the Knight"
trans-unit.target: 「卿卿吾爱，盼你领情！ 冒险呼唤，需我远行。」 ～「学者与骑士」

trans-unit.source: Copy Enchantment
trans-unit.target: 复制结界

trans-unit.source: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使复制结界当成战场上任一结界的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.source: "'I don't need anyone else', muttered Hylda. 'You don't need anyone else,' her reflection agreed.\n—Witch of Winter
trans-unit.target: 「『我不需要其他人，』希尔妲低声自语。『你不需要其他人，』镜中影像随声附和。」 ～《凛冬女巫传》

trans-unit.source: Curiosity
trans-unit.target: 好奇

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的生物向任一对手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Valtry gasped. The strange new coral was not coral at all, but a fallen drywalker! But how did it get to the bottom of Loch Larent?"\n—*The Merfolk Who Walked*
trans-unit.target: 「瓦翠惊得倒吸一口气：这株奇怪的新生珊瑚根本就不是珊瑚，而是一个落水的地上人！但它又是怎样来到拉伦特湖底的呢？」 ～《长脚的人鱼》

trans-unit.source: Forced Fruition
trans-unit.target: 强迫结实

trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，该牌手抓七张牌。

trans-unit.source: "'My kingdom for a feast!' quoth the king. A faerie appeared before him, and spoke through a wicked grin: 'As you wish.'"\n—*Tales of the Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「『就用王国换大餐！』国王说道。突然有个仙灵在他面前出现，坏笑道：『如你所愿。』」 ～《仙儿传说》

trans-unit.source: Fraying Sanity
trans-unit.target: 崩碎心智

trans-unit.resname: WOT·19 | Fraying Sanity | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant player
trans-unit.target: 结附于牌手

trans-unit.resname: WOT·19 | Fraying Sanity | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，所结附的牌手磨X张牌，X为本回合中从任何区域进入其坟墓场之牌的数量。

trans-unit.source: "I saw my mind stretch like cloth on a loom,\nWarping, twisting toward a deathless doom."\n—*A Traveler's Trials*
trans-unit.target: 「在我眼前，自身思绪如织机上的滚动缕线， 拉伸扭曲，缓缓扯向死气沉沉的无尽黯涧。」 ～《旅人渡劫记》

trans-unit.source: Hatching Plans
trans-unit.target: 策划计谋

trans-unit.source: When Hatching Plans is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当策划计谋从战场进入坟墓场时，抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The thief fled with her ill-gotten prize, her mind awhirl with visions of wealth and glory. In her pack, unnoticed, the egg began to stir and crack."\n—*Tales of the Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「飞贼得手后，带着收获信步离开，脑中已满是飞黄腾达的美妙幻想。但她藏在包中的那颗蛋暗自开始扭动、破壳。」 ～《仙儿传说》

trans-unit.source: Intruder Alarm
trans-unit.target: 入侵警报

trans-unit.resname: WOT·21 | Intruder Alarm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·21 | Intruder Alarm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物进战场时，重置所有生物。

trans-unit.source: "The dark forest lit up with a thousand eyes, and for the first time, Jurald considered that the High Fae might be more than myth."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
trans-unit.target: 「黑暗森林中刹那之间睁开万千只眼睛，这是裘若首次觉得至高仙可能不仅只是传说。」 ～《圆石阵奇谭》

trans-unit.source: Kindred Discovery
trans-unit.target: 同族发现

trans-unit.resname: WOT·22 | Kindred Discovery | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于同族发现进战场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·22 | Kindred Discovery | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的该类别生物进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The towers were like a song on the night breeze, faint and lovely, calling her home."\n—*A Quickling's Journey*
trans-unit.target: 「高塔映入眼帘，就像那随夜风传来的思乡歌谣，低声轻柔地唤她回家。」 ～《迅敏灵之旅》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Anticipation
trans-unit.target: 先制地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了先制地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A glowing spring appeared before her, promising untold wisdom. Still she walked on."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她眼前出现一道亮光涌泉，水流淙淙，似在应允传授隐世奇知。但她未加理会，径直前行。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.source: Omniscience
trans-unit.target: 全知全能

trans-unit.source: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你手上施放咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source:
"They are led by Talion, the Kindly Lord,
First and Greatest of the High Fae,
Sovereign of the Court, the Liege of Laughter,
Finder of the First Yew, and the One True Lord of Eldraine."
—*On the High Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「仙灵全都听令于塔莱恩，仁慈之主，甚伟至高始仙，仙灵廷君主，欢笑王侯，初代紫杉发现者，艾卓唯一真王。」 ～《至高仙传》

trans-unit.source: Rhystic Study
trans-unit.target: 琉晶研究

trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Despite her father's warnings, Valtry's fascination with the surface only grew. She collected things that fell to the bottom, daydreaming of life on land."\n—*The Merfolk Who Walked*
trans-unit.target: 「虽屡遭父亲劝止，但瓦翠对陆地却越发向往。她不停收集落入湖底的东西，不断想象水面上的生活风貌。」 ～《长脚的人鱼》

trans-unit.source: Spreading Seas
trans-unit.target: 海域蔓延

trans-unit.resname: WOT·26 | Spreading Seas | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant land
trans-unit.target: 结附于地

trans-unit.resname: WOT·26 | Spreading Seas | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当海域蔓延进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·26 | Spreading Seas | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted land is an Island.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的地是海岛。

trans-unit.source: "Hasty efforts to defend Castle Vantress left it more moat than castle."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「凡翠丝堡守军仓促应战，致使城堡荡然无存，空余护城河水流动。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.source: Bitterblossom
trans-unit.target: 苦涩花开

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你失去1点生命并派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生生物。

trans-unit.source:
"Tarry not in Tuinvale,
Ignore the flowers' heady scents.
Take no thing, stay to the trail,
Lest the fae seek recompense."
—*To Walk the Wilds*
trans-unit.target: 「图音谷中勿停留， 鲜花芬芳不要嗅。 路遇他物莫伸手， 以免仙儿来寻仇。」 ～《幻野游记》

trans-unit.source: Dark Tutelage
trans-unit.target: 黑暗教导

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。你失去等同于其法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.source: "Ours is a path of the outcast, of pain given and pain received. But for the strong, it is a path that leads to power untethered from fae riddles."\n—*The Witch's Way*
trans-unit.target: 「我们所选之道虽然受人唾弃：不仅予人痛苦，自身也会受尽折磨；但对强者而言，这是掌握破除仙灵谜题困扰之强大力量的必由之路。」 ～《巫婆之道》

trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: "'Fools,' sneered the witch. 'I never intended to leave here alive. And thanks to your dogged insistence on following me, neither will you.'"\n—*Hexes of Dunbarrow*
trans-unit.target: 「『蠢货，』巫婆冷笑道。『我从没想过要活着离开这里。既然你们都已死死跟了过来，那就都别走。』」 ～《黯沼野邪咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of the Void
trans-unit.target: 虚空地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了虚空地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某牌将从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Malevolent lights pulsed around her, whispering of riches in the dark. Still she walked on."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她眼前出现一阵邪恶幽光，忽明忽暗，似怕人不知深处藏财富。但她未加理会，径直前行。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.source: Necropotence
trans-unit.target: 死冥权能

trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step.
trans-unit.target: 略过你的抓牌步骤。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当你弃一张牌时，将该牌从你的坟墓场放逐。

trans-unit.source: Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
trans-unit.target: 支付1点生命：牌面朝下地放逐你的牌库顶牌。在你的下一个结束步骤开始时，将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.source: Oppression
trans-unit.target: 压制

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放咒语时，该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "'The human world will fall,' whispered the monstrous rat. 'You have but one choice to make: Will you fall with it?'"\n—*Song of the Vermin*
trans-unit.target: 「『人界将亡，』硕鼠低语。『你只需作一个选择：是否要随之一同毁灭？』」 ～《病媒魔曲》

trans-unit.source: Oversold Cemetery
trans-unit.target: 超卖墓园

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "'Get out! Get out!' the dead screamed.\n'We've not room for one more! Get out!'"\n—*Hexes of Dunbarrow*
trans-unit.target: 「『滚出去！滚出去！』亡者嚷道。『已经没位了！滚出去！』」 ～《黯沼野邪咒》

trans-unit.source: Polluted Bonds
trans-unit.target: 污物羁绊

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地在对手操控下进战场时，该牌手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "'Twas the cruelest of ironies: the realm, in desperate need of rest, gripped by endless sleep that offered no comfort."\n—*The Wicked Slumber*
trans-unit.target: 「这真是一个莫大的讽刺：世境虽亟需休养生息，但却困于无尽沉眠中不得安宁。」 ～《恶邪倦眠咒》

trans-unit.source: Sanguine Bond
trans-unit.target: 血色羁绊

trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，目标对手失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "The witch smiled, savoring every stolen year. Every love the knight would never court, every meal he'd never taste, every honor he'd never win, was sweet as honey on her tongue."\n—*Hexes of Dunbarrow*
trans-unit.target: 「巫婆笑容满面，细细品味她窃来的每年时光。骑士未及赢得的每份爱意，未及品尝的每顿佳肴，未及争来的每份荣耀，在巫婆舌尖都如蜜糖般甜美。」 ～《黯沼野邪咒》

trans-unit.source: Stab Wound
trans-unit.target: 刺创伤

trans-unit.resname: WOT·36 | Stab Wound | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: WOT·36 | Stab Wound | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得-2/-2。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·36 | Stab Wound | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 在所结附的生物之操控者的维持开始时，该牌手失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "What first seemed like a ridiculous and vaguely demeaning task quickly turned into a vicious struggle for survival."\n—*Welcome to Sweettooth*
trans-unit.target: 「起初看似荒唐丢脸的无谓任务，很快就变成了尔虞我诈的求生之争。」 ～《甘饴村迎客》

trans-unit.source: Vampiric Rites
trans-unit.target: 吸血鬼仪式

trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Should prying eyes observe the ritual, seize them for the cauldron, and soak the altar with the blood of the witness."\n—The Witch's Way
trans-unit.target: 「若有人胆敢偷看仪式，就将他们丢入锅中，用他们的鲜血来浸洗祭坛。」 ～《巫婆之道》

trans-unit.source: Waste Not
trans-unit.target: 物尽其用

trans-unit.resname: WOT·38 | Waste Not | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手弃一张生物牌时，你派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·38 | Waste Not | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B}.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手弃一张地牌时，你加{B}{B}。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·38 | Waste Not | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手弃一张非生物且非地的牌时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Aggravated Assault
trans-unit.target: 急躁的突袭

trans-unit.source: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. If it's a main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}{R}：重置所有由你操控的生物。如果当前是行动阶段，则会额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: "The knights of Embereth fought with the fire of the Irencrag in their hearts. Though many fell, not a single one retreated."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「鞍博雷骑士心怀伊雷岩烈焰奋勇作战。虽纷纷折戟沙场，却无人后退一步。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.source: Blood Moon
trans-unit.target: 腥红之月

trans-unit.source: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
trans-unit.target: 非基本地都是山脉。

trans-unit.source:
"The wyrm's dread eye upon the land
was turned.
And all its people bent the knee—
or burned."
—"The Night of Dragonfire"
trans-unit.target: 「恶龙惧目，大地翻震， 人民屈膝，违者遭焚。」 ～「龙火之夜」

trans-unit.source: Dragon Mantle
trans-unit.target: 龙披风

trans-unit.resname: WOT·41 | Dragon Mantle | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: WOT·41 | Dragon Mantle | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当龙披风进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·41 | Dragon Mantle | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有「{R}：此生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.source: "With reckless courage, Cade embraced the flame.\nHe vowed they wouldn't dare forget his name."\n—"The Night of Dragonfire"
trans-unit.target: 「蛮勇凯德挡烈焰， 誓令世人把名念。」 ～「龙火之夜」

trans-unit.source: Fiery Emancipation
trans-unit.target: 焰浪无拘

trans-unit.source: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由你操控的来源将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成三倍的伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Mighty Torbran struck the invading phalanx like a bolt from the heavens. When the light faded, only ash remained around him."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「强大的托班从天而降，以雷霆万钧之势直扑侵攻军团。待电光落定之后，四周只余尘土。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.source: Goblin Bombardment
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪轰炸

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：鬼怪轰炸对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "What redcaps lack in strategic acumen they more than make up for with brazen audacity."\n—*The Kenriths' Royal Bestiary*
trans-unit.target: 「红帽客鬼怪大胆无畏，这点大大补充了他们在战术意识上的不足。」 ～《肯理斯皇家怪物图鉴》

trans-unit.source: Impact Tremors
trans-unit.target: 冲击震颤

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，冲击震颤向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "With tears in his smoke-scorched eyes, he watched the living flames consume the only home he'd ever known."\n—*The Apprentice's Folly*
trans-unit.target: 「他被浓烟熏得泪水直流，只能眼睁睁地看着活体火焰将他所知的唯一家园烧个精光。」 ～《学徒闯大祸》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·45 | Leyline of Lightning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Lightning
trans-unit.target: 雷电地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·45 | Leyline of Lightning | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了雷电地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·45 | Leyline of Lightning | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则雷电地脉对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Mana Flare
trans-unit.target: 魔法力闪光

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手横置一个地以产生法术力时，该牌手加一点该地已产生的类别之法术力。

trans-unit.source: "I give my heart to the mountain, my memories to the wind. Let my last moment be burned into history."\n—*Daughters of Flame*
trans-unit.target: 「我将心胸献给山河，将记忆奉予清风。就让我焚烧自己，将生命最后时刻写入历史。」 ～《烈焰的女儿》

trans-unit.source: Raid Bombardment
trans-unit.target: 突击轰炸

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物攻击时，突击轰炸对该生物所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "For slaying dozens of redcaps using only fruit and cakes, the dwarven survivors were dubbed the Gluttoneers."\n—*Assault on Delverhaugh*
trans-unit.target: 「因其单凭水果及蛋糕击杀成群红帽客之壮举，所有的矮人幸存者都被封为饕枪客。」 ～《突袭深掘台》

trans-unit.source: Repercussion
trans-unit.target: 后遗症

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物受到伤害时，后遗症对该生物的操控者造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Tugrunn threw blow after blow, howling with pain as his fist met solid rock. The creature merely stared quizzically at him, unsure when the fight would start."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「图古伦接连出击，拳点如雨，但又因捶石吃痛而哀叫不断。对方只是不解地看着他，不知道这场架什么时候才能开始。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.source: Shared Animosity
trans-unit.target: 同仇敌忾

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物攻击时，战场上每有一个与它具共通生物类别的其他攻击生物，它便得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The feud between dwarves and redcaps had raged for so long that no one could quite recall how it started. Few would believe it was sparked by a long-ago dispute over a spoon."\n—*Assault on Delverhaugh*
trans-unit.target: 「矮人跟红帽客之间积怨已久，甚至已经没人能说清起因到底为何。有传说这梁子是因许久以前的一次争抢汤勺而结下的。」 ～《突袭深掘台》

trans-unit.source: Sneak Attack
trans-unit.target: 偷袭

trans-unit.source: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {R}：你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。该生物获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，牺牲该生物。

trans-unit.source: "Korlag carefully prepared to try the new 'am bush' strategy he'd heard about."\n—*The Ogre's Revenge*
trans-unit.target: 「寇葛精心准备，迫不及待地想要尝试他新听到的『伏棘』妙计。」 ～《食人魔复仇记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·51 | Defense of the Heart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Defense of the Heart
trans-unit.target: 心防

trans-unit.resname: WOT·51 | Defense of the Heart | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若某对手操控三个或更多生物，则牺牲心防，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张生物牌，将这些牌放进在战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·51 | Defense of the Heart | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "And as the rose began to bloom, the curse of Redtooth Keep began, at last, to wither."\n—*Curse of the Werefox*
trans-unit.target: 「随着玫瑰逐渐绽放，赤牙砦下的诅咒方才慢慢褪去。」 ～《半狐诅咒》

trans-unit.source: Doubling Season
trans-unit.target: 倍产旺季

trans-unit.resname: WOT·52 | Doubling Season | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为它派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·52 | Doubling Season | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将在由你操控的永久物上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该永久物上放置两倍数量的该类指示物。

trans-unit.source: Garruk's Uprising
trans-unit.target: 贾路的反抗

trans-unit.resname: WOT·53 | Garruk's Uprising | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当贾路的反抗进战场时，若你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·53 | Garruk's Uprising | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have trample.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·53 | Garruk's Uprising | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个力量等于或大于4的生物在你的操控下进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Ground Seal
trans-unit.target: 大地封印

trans-unit.resname: WOT·54 | Ground Seal | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当大地封印进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·54 | Ground Seal | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 坟墓场中的牌不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: "They laid her to rest in the wilds, in a sacred place beyond the reach of nightmares or machines."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她被葬在幻野深处的圣洁地界，纵连梦魇邪械亦不能及。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.source: Hardened Scales
trans-unit.target: 坚固鳞甲

trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在某个由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在其上放置该数量加一的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Before me writhed the guardian of my prize,\nA serpent with stone skin and cunning eyes!"\n—*A Traveler's Trials*
trans-unit.target: 「眼前珍宝守卫盘卷身躯，想阻我得手； 巨蛇顽石附体眼神灵动，怕是难赶走！」 ～《旅人渡劫记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·56 | Leyline of Abundance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Abundance
trans-unit.target: 丰足地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·56 | Leyline of Abundance | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If Leyline of Abundance is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了丰足地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·56 | Leyline of Abundance | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you tap a creature for mana, add an additional {G}.
trans-unit.target: 每当你横置一个生物以产生法术力时，额外加{G}。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·56 | Leyline of Abundance | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {6}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: {6}{G}{G}：在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Nature's Will
trans-unit.target: 大自然之愿

trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，横置所有由该牌手操控的地并重置所有由你操控的地。

trans-unit.source: "The troll took the fauns' hesitation as fear and roared in triumph. In truth, they'd seen the ledge begin to crack beneath his weight."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「巨魔见羊怪行动迟缓，觉得自己已经威服对方，不禁发出胜利怒号。然而，羊怪是看到巨魔脚下岩石不堪重压开始崩裂，才没有轻举妄动。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.source: Parallel Lives
trans-unit.target: 平行生命

trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为它派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。

trans-unit.source: "Brave Syr Armont mused: Was the elves' true nature that of day's civility or night's savagery? Could such bestial rage be bestowed by curse alone?"\n—*Curse of the Werefox*
trans-unit.target: 「勇敢的娅蒙爵士若有所思：妖精真正的本性到底为何？是白天的谦恭有礼，还是夜晚的凶蛮无道？这等狂野的兽性，难道就只因为诅咒之故？」 ～《半狐诅咒》

trans-unit.source: Primal Vigor
trans-unit.target: 原初活力

trans-unit.resname: WOT·59 | Primal Vigor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more tokens would be created, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·59 | Primal Vigor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在某生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在该生物上放置该数量两倍的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Prismatic Omen
trans-unit.target: 五彩预兆

trans-unit.source: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地均额外具有所有基本地类别。

trans-unit.source: "There would be time later to mourn the lost, to weep for their fallen homes and lost treasures. But for now, they breathed in the untainted air and allowed themselves to hope again."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「日后有的是时间来为死难同胞发丧，为失落家园和损失财富落泪。如今是要让生者存于未受污染的空气之下，让他们重燃光复家园的希望。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·61 | Season of Growth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Season of Growth
trans-unit.target: 成长季节

trans-unit.resname: WOT·61 | Season of Growth | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·61 | Season of Growth | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放以由你操控之生物为目标的咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Unnatural Growth
trans-unit.target: 超凡成长

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，将每个由你操控之生物的力量和防御力均加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source:
"Should you hear witchstalkers howl,
Best to hide or run away.
They hunt witches vile and foul.
Fear both predator and prey."
—*To Walk the Wilds*
trans-unit.target: 「猎巫狼群一声吼， 赶忙躲起快逃走。 猎杀巫婆下狠手， 猎人猎物见了愁。」 ～《幻野游记》

trans-unit.source: Utopia Sprawl
trans-unit.target: 理想境蔓生

trans-unit.resname: WOT·63 | Utopia Sprawl | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant Forest
trans-unit.target: 结附于树林

trans-unit.resname: WOT·63 | Utopia Sprawl | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.
trans-unit.target: 于理想境蔓生进战场时，选择一种颜色。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·63 | Utopia Sprawl | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.
trans-unit.target: 每当横置所结附的树林以产生法术力时，其操控者额外加一点所选颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.
As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
{3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.
Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
{R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.resname: WOT·80 | Defense of the Heart | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.
As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
{3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.
Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
{R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.resname: WOT·100 | Defense of the Heart | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
